HOW_DOES_IT_WORKS_SUBTITLE: Discover how you can exchange products and services seamlessly with SwapyCampus.
STEP1_SUBTITLE: Click on Submit an Offer and provide detailed information about your exchange.
STEP2_SUBTITLE: Browse offers from other students to find the perfect match for your needs.
STEP3_SUBTITLE: Negotiate and finalize the exchange securely within the platform.
STEP4_SUBTITLE: Complete the exchange and enjoy the benefits of SwapyCampus.
